SEARCH
Package game.grounds.spawner

Interface Spawn

All Known Implementing Classes:
Crater, Spawner
public interface Spawn
Interface defining the behavior for spawning actors within the game world.

This interface provides a contract for implementing actor spawning mechanisms, which can be used by various components of the game to populate the game environment dynamically. It specifies a method for spawning actors at a given location with a specified chance of spawning.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    spawnActor(Location location, Actor actor, int spawnChance)
    Attempts to spawn an actor at a specified location based on a given probability.

  • Method Details

    • spawnActor

      void spawnActor(Location location, Actor actor, int spawnChance)
      Attempts to spawn an actor at a specified location based on a given probability.

      This method provides the functionality to place an actor at a particular location in the game map, contingent upon a specified spawn chance. The implementation should handle the probability logic and the actual placement of the actor within the game environment.

      Parameters:
      location - The location at which to attempt to spawn the actor.
      actor - The actor to be spawned.
      spawnChance - The percentage chance (0-100) of the actor spawning at the location.
